page.title: 20EDUCATION SCHOOL
page.content: {LEGBOURNE C.E. SCHOOL This school has written this disc.The school was built in 1863.In the school there are two full-time teachers and one part-time teacher.The head of the school is called Mrs.Mableson.In the school grounds is a demountable classroom with Infants working in it. The teacher who teaches the Infants is called Mrs.Hirst.In the school there are 49 children.The part-time teacher called Mrs.Stainton teaches the Lower Juniors and the head teaches the Upper Juniors.The subjects that we do are Maths,English,Science,Social Studies, R.E.,P.E.,Art,Craft and Music.In this school we do not wear uniform.The favourite subjects of the Upper Juniors are Maths and English. We have all enjoyed working on The Domesday Project and visiting the many farms.
